meta.title: Contract #003: The Distraction
meta.description: TUTORIAL: Use Simultaneity (<=>) for events happening at the same time.
meta.journal: The fire alarm was a precision decoy. Security logs confirm the guard rotation left the Server Room exposed at the exact second the download began. This was a coordinated professional hit.

nodes.text: 03:00 - Alarm Log: Fire alarm triggered in East Wing.
03:00 - Server Log: Unauthorized data download begins in West Wing.
03:05 - Guard Report: All security personnel move to East Wing.
